sentence: The Dow Jones Industrial Average and S&P 500 raced to new record highs on Monday after the Senate passed their version of pro-growth tax reform early Saturday morning, clearing the way for US corporations to pay lower federal taxes.

As a result, investors swapped tech stocks for shares of companies who stand the most to benefit from tax reform including Dow components Home Depot ( HD ), Disney ( DIS ) and General Electric ( GE ).
The Nasdaq is underwater for a second straight day as the rotation from chipmakers and FANG stocks causes the Nasdaq to underperform the Dow for a sixth consecutive day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
